landing.noapp: Ntukeneye porogaramu yo gukoresha {{ BRAND }} kuri terefone yawe cyangwa tableti!
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) ninzira nziza yo guhura ninshuti nshya.  {{ BRAND }}, duhitamo undi muntu uko bishakiye hanyuma tureke tuvugane umwe-umwe.   <6>Amategeko n'amabwiriza</6>, na <8>Amabwiriza y'abaturage</8> kumakuru yerekeye gukora no gukora mugukoresha {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} ikiganiro cya videwo ni AI igereranijwe ariko ntagipimo cyuzuye.  {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Ugomba kuba ufite imyaka 18 (cyangwa ubwinshi bwemewe nububasha bwawe) cyangwa mukuru kugirango ukoreshe {{BRAND}}</0>.  {{BRAND}}'s <4>Amategeko n'amabwiriza</4> kubindi bisobanuro.  <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> kimwe nizindi mbuga.
landing.pleaseleave: Nyamuneka va Lamdazle hanyuma usure urubuga rwabantu bakuru aho niba aribyo urimo gushaka kandi ufite imyaka 18 (cyangwa benshi mubyemewe mububasha bwawe) cyangwa urengeje imyaka.
landing.termscheck: Mugenzura agasanduku wemera ko wasuzumye icyemezo cyo kubahiriza {{BRAND}}'s <3>Amategeko n'amabwiriza</3>, <5>Politiki y’ibanga</5> na <7>Amabwiriza y'abaturage</7>.
landing.agecheck: Ntushobora gukoresha iyi serivisi niba uri munsi yimyaka 18 cyangwa imyaka yubukure bwemewe nububasha bwawe.  <1>Amategeko n'amabwiriza</1> kubindi bisobanuro. <3>Mugenzura agasanduku wemera kandi uhagarariye ko ufite imyaka 18 (cyangwa ubwinshi bwemewe nububasha bwawe) cyangwa urengeje imyaka.</3>

chat.language: Mwembi muvuga ururimi rumwe.  {{"Any"}} kurutonde rwururimi kugirango uhagarike.

alerts.keepclean: Komeza kugira isuku kandi ufashe kumenyesha imyitwarire ya NSFW
